articles.author: HT Sports Desk
articles.title: Watch: Kohli's 'voodoo act' with bails results in Bumrah's double strike - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Jasprit Bumrah got two wickets after Virat Kohli flipped the bails on Day 2 of the India vs South Africa 1st Test in Centurion. | Cricket
articles.content: What do you do when two batters are batting really and a wicket is nowhere in sight? You simply walk up to the stumps and flip the bails. Seems like poor a joke? Not exactly. It's slowly but surely t… [+2849 chars]
